recordTypes.name: Electrical Contractor Registration
recordTypes.description: Contractor registration and renewal in order to perform work

recordTypes.name: Contact
recordTypes.description: This record type is used to enter general contacts such as Architects, Engineers, Designers, Surveyors and so on.  Please enter your information into the form if you want to add yourself to a permit as the contractor.

recordTypes.name: Accessory Building - Residential
recordTypes.description: Permits for accessory buildings, garages, sheds over 150sf. THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Accessory Building - Commercial
recordTypes.description: THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Accessory Building - Zoning Certificate
recordTypes.description: Any shed or accessory structure 150sf or less must obtain a no-cost zoning certificate. THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit - Commercial
recordTypes.description: New construction, building additions, remodeling. THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: HVAC Contractor Registration
recordTypes.description: Contractor registration and renewal in order to perform work

recordTypes.name: Cell Tower
recordTypes.description: Permits for cell towers and equipment. THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Sign Erector License
recordTypes.description: Sign Erector license and renewal in order to perform work

recordTypes.name: Change of Occupancy
recordTypes.description: Permit for opening a new business in an existing building.  A floor plan is required to be submitted upon application. THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Building Permit - Residential
recordTypes.description: New home construction, building additions, remodeling. THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Deck - Residential
recordTypes.description: THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Deck - Commercial
recordTypes.description: THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Demolition - Commercial
recordTypes.description: Permits for the demolition of commercial buildings.

recordTypes.name: Demolition - Residential
recordTypes.description: Permits for house demolition.

recordTypes.name: Driveway/Apron - Zoning Certificate
recordTypes.description: This application is for the widening of a driveway, apron/sidewalk replacements, and curb cuts. A site map showing where the work is to be done and the dimensions is required.

recordTypes.name: Fence - Commercial
recordTypes.description: THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Apron/Curb - Commercial
recordTypes.description: This application is for existing apron areas and/or curbs only for commercial properties. A site map showing where the work is to be done and the dimensions is required.

recordTypes.name: Fence - Residential
recordTypes.description:
This permit is for fences over 4ft tall ONLY. The tallest fencing allowed in the City of Fairfield is 6ft. 

THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Fire Suppression Sprinkler
recordTypes.description: Fire suppression sprinklers and underground fire lines

recordTypes.name: Fence - Zoning Certificate
recordTypes.description:
This no cost Fence - Zoning Certificate is required for fences 4ft tall or less in height. 

For fences over 4ft in height, please go back and fill out a "Fence - Residential" permit application.

recordTypes.name: HVAC Kitchen Hood- Commercial
recordTypes.description: This permit requires the applicant to have an HVAC registration.

recordTypes.name: Handicap Ramp/Stairlift (Metal) - Zoning Certificate
recordTypes.description: THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Pool - Residential
recordTypes.description: THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Pool - Commercial
recordTypes.description: THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Promotional Tent
recordTypes.description: Flame Retardant Certificate is required to be submitted upon application.

recordTypes.name: Solar Panels - Residential
recordTypes.description: THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Sign - Grand Opening
recordTypes.description: Permit for temporary Grand Opening Signage. THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Sign - Permanent
recordTypes.description: This permit requires application by a sign contractor that has been licensed with the City of Fairfield. THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Sign - Promotional
recordTypes.description: Permit for temporary Special Event Signs, Flutter Flags, and Promotional Banners. THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Solar Panel - Commercial
recordTypes.description: THIS PERMIT TYPE REQUIRES ZONING REVIEW AND APPROVAL. PLAN REVIEW WILL BEGIN AFTER ZONING IS APPROVED.

recordTypes.name: Tanks
recordTypes.description: Permit for aboveground/underground storage tanks.

categories.name: Building Department - Residential Permits
categories.content:
Responsibilities

The Building and Zoning Division protects residents’ health, safety and welfare as they relate to new construction, additions, remodeling and existing buildings.

The City of Fairfield enforces building codes, along with other adopted zoning and property maintenance codes, to protect you by making sure the building is constructed properly, that the
